descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Devin Vassell drives into the paint and unloads a mean dunk to extend the Spurs' lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Devin Vassell throws down big slam dunk vs. Miami Heat) 2022/02/27 ESHEET

videos.headline: Devin Vassell unleashes filthy posterizing jam

videos.description: Jock Landale hauls in the rock and knocks down the and-1 over Jimmy Butler for the Spurs.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jock Landale gets the basket plus the foul) 2022/02/27 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jock Landale gathers the rock and drains and-1

videos.description: Tyler Herro drives past three Spurs defenders and for the layup to extend the Heat's lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Tyler Herro knocks down shot) 2022/02/27 ESHEET

videos.headline: Tyler Herro maneuvers through the Spurs defense and drains the layup

videos.description: Bam Adebayo won't be denied as he powers through his defender for the and-1 to pull the Heat within six.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bam Adebayo with the and-1 bucket) 2022/02/27 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bam muscles through his defender for the and-1

videos.description: Jimmy Butler drives into the paint and somehow drains the and-1 to regain the lead before halftime.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jimmy Butler gets the and-1 to fall) 2022/02/27 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jimmy Butler gets the hoop and the harm to regain the lead

videos.description: Bam Adebayo gathers the rock and takes it coast-to-coast for the layup to extend the Heat's lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bam Adebayo knocks down bucket) 2022/02/27 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bam is smooth as silk as he takes it coast-to-coast for the bucket

videos.description: Bam Adebayo pulls up and knocks down the jumper at the third quarter buzzer to give the Heat the lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bam Adebayo nails buzzer-beater vs. San Antonio Spurs) 2022/02/27 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bam is cooking as he buries the shot as time expires in the 3rd quarter
